Uses of Package
org.jfree.chart.needle

Packages that use org.jfree.chart.needle 
Package Description
org.jfree.chart.needle
A range of objects that can be used to represent the needle on a CompassPlot.
org.jfree.chart.plot
Plot classes and related interfaces.
  • Classes in org.jfree.chart.needle used by org.jfree.chart.needle 
    Class Description
    ArrowNeedle
    A needle in the shape of an arrow.
    MeterNeedle
    The base class used to represent the needle on a CompassPlot.
  • Classes in org.jfree.chart.needle used by org.jfree.chart.plot 
    Class Description
    MeterNeedle
    The base class used to represent the needle on a CompassPlot.
